title: All I Care About Today Is ‘Killing Eve’ Stars Sandra Oh & Jodie Comer Being IRL Besties
text:
Thanks for signing up!

I am obsessed with celebrities being friends, but specifically I get extremely excited when people who star in TV shows together become friends IRL. Like Killing Eve’s Sandra Oh & Jodie Comer, my latest obsession.

I don’t know why it always tickles me – I’m friends with people I work with, for example. Maybe with Sandra & Jodie, it’s because they fucking hate each other on TV? And because Jodie plays a literal psychopath murderer?

Anyway, I’ve been enjoying these photos today, so you should too.

Loooooook they love each other.

Then there’s all the red carpet shots.

Look at them holding hands ahdfksgdlshdl I can’t handle it.

Extremely cute areas. Now give us more Killing Eve or we riot. Are you listening, Phoebe Waller-Bridge?
description: All we care about today is the fact Killing Eve stars Sandra Oh & Jodie Comer, who play Eve and Villanelle, are friends in real life.
